alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Nash (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 3:57PM EDT until August 15 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL NASH AND NORTHWESTERN EDGECOMBE COUNTIES... At 357 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Dortches to 6 miles east of Rocky Mount to near Elm City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rocky Mount, Tarboro, Dortches, Red Oak, Leggett, Battleboro, Kingsboro and Tar River Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Raleigh.
